name: collabogarden (prototype)
description:
demo/prototype 

transform a suburban lawn into a garden!

how to play:
- Left click on item in menu to select or deselect
- Hold and drag in menu to see more items
- Left click on lawn with item selected to place it
- Right click already placed item to change rotation or growth stage
- Left click on item on lawn with nothing selected to remove it
